item.title: Create your own blog in 30 minutes using Hugo, a static site generator written in Go
item.description: Do you know you can create your blog without any knowledge of content management system or actual knowledge of creating a website, setting it, styling it or improving it? Well, you can with the worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites that is Hugo Before going forward it is suggested that you must have an account on Github for hosting your blog. Why Hugo? Hugo is the fastest tool of its kind.
